data.text: I have used PayPal for and it has been great. But, since I've used the pay in 4 option. I have been dealing with problems. Last night I tried to use the pay in 4 option for a payment, and was granted but my phone cut out of service. I went back today to do it and was denied. When I looked in my connected account, the deposit amount was taken from yesterday and the DENIED attempts today. I have tried calling and texting to fix this because I have pending transactions and can't go on.
data.replyText: Hello there! We understand your concern regarding the issue with PayPal in 4. To know more information on pending transactions, please visit https://www.paypal.com/cshelp/article/HELP465. For further assistance, kindly visit paypal.com to contact us. Our team will review and assist you. Apologies for the inconvenience this may have caused. -Shirley

data.text: I understand the need for security, but the system is way too over the top. Sometimes if you just barely miss something it takes you 20 minutes to get past. Secondly, the website said it couldn't understand my request, so it's not smart enough to connect to google pay. Third, I can't add any of my cards. It keeps saying that that I have insufficient funds(Even though it said I didn't have to pay for anything) or that I need to add a different card, even though my card was VISA.

They suck now. Their security methods are exhausting with all those little pictures to prove you're human. I've been told that they steal your information from your phone when they make you do those puzzles. Also, they changed the app so now I can't find my PayPal Credit balance in the app. I have to go online. And just because my balance went up to $90, it resulted in a 39 point drop on my credit score.
data.replyText: I am sorry to hear that you had to go through this. Issues like accessing accounts, resetting passwords must be resolved over the phone. Regrettably, we at Social Media Support cannot verify the user identity due to the security concerns involved in this medium.

data.text: if you actually need the money someone's sending you, you're better off using almost any other platform. PayPal will decide arbitrarily to send payments as an "e-check" which just means it's going to take a week to be put into your account for no reason. plus they're constantly trying to get you to sign up for credit cards and such and will bug you multiple times per transaction to do so. thinking about getting cashapp to avoid the wait times and constant popup bombardment

What happened? it was good in the past. Most of the auto fill fields don't work. The lag from my click to display keeps me doubting if it registered me clicking on something. Less than 10% of the home screen is relevant to me. Changing addresses and card information is more difficult than it needs to be. I just use this for casual payments and it's a process anytime I use PayPal, I almost gave up on a $30 purchase today just because of all the friction, it took me almost 5 minutes to pay!

I bought a new toolset for my fiancÃ© bc he got a new job. Two weeks after purchase, it still hadn't been shipped. "Customer support" came back as an invalid email. The site I bought it from literally disappeared. I was sure I was out $80. Thank God I screenshot every single purchase, just in case. It was surprisingly easy to file a claim thru PayPal. I sent in my screenshots, all the proof, and was refunded immediately. I really, really, really appreciate this so much!!! Thank you PayPal!!!

Too hard to get to the transaction history. Thats the first thing i need to see, not go through 3 icons or menus to get to. Second. The transaction history display does not show the YEAR in the date. Im not sure they are ordered by history and not sure how to change that. I have tranactions from my dead father at the top of the list. Hectic. App is pretty much useless with the update. Im looking for a transaction i have an issue with, and i cant even find it.

In earlier iterations of the app, there USED to be a link to go to PayPal credit front and center on the home page. Now the app has been quite rearranged (for streamlining, probably) WITH NO CREDIT LINK! Some one had the bright idea of parking it under WALLET. I'm sure it would be found after some searches, but it's just a needless hassle.
data.replyText: Hi there! Thanks for contacting PayPal. We are sorry for any inconvenience you faced with PayPal Credit. You can get in touch with our customer support directly by selecting Help & Contact at the bottom of our webpage and then select Contact Us for further assistance.

data.text: Poor. I use the app to send payments to business partners from another linked bank account. I had one successful transaction, afterward no success. I've called support & was told to call my bank. As if they didn't want to find a solution to the problem. I also gave my correct phone number & go into the app again& no number is listed. The security checks don't work. My linked bank account shows up, but when needed to transfer $, it makes me enter card # details. Nothing works correctly.

There are so many errors and so many bugs and the fact that they've been around since 1999 roughly makes it even more absurd. It is so difficult to add a card to pay the balance off.... It is so frustrating also to have that captcha pattern just keep asking you for new things to click on when I clicked on the right pics.... The errors on this app is unacceptable when the company has been around since the 90s. I will be deleting my app and my account.
data.replyText: We are really sorry for the experience you had. I appreciate your feedback.

data.text: I use this to manage payments to PayPal Credit. since the most recent update, the "widget" that takes you to PayPal credit was moved from the first page- front and center, where it needed to be!- to being ONLY accessible if you search for it and eventually find it under "wallet". now the widgets on the front page show PayPal rewards- a feature I do not and will never use- and my standard PayPal balance. this is unnecessarily frustrating.

The "Transfer in Minutes" pop up is aggravating. The developer intentionally did this. It pops up seconds before you press the standard free transfer. The button placement is deceitful and has caused me to accidently select the transfer in minutes option and pay an erroneous fee several times on transfers from my store. This was done intentionally and PayPal had better be careful or they may get a class action motion for this deceptive tactic. There is no reason why the button placement is there

I'm a long time user. Those struggling with refunds or transactions, contact the merchant first. Paypal is only a money service. || I recently used the Cash a Check option, but the Check Status option currently crashes the app. I've tested this on multiple smartphones (I save my old phones as emergency). Different models, same crashing. CS: don't tell me to uninstall/reinstall when I literally said it happens across multiple phones. I'm in IT and reporting this issue as a tech educated user.
data.replyText: We're sorry you're having trouble with the app. Try updating the app after uninstalling, restarting the device, reinstalling, then clearing cache. If you need further assistance, contact customer service at https://bit.ly/ContactPayPal. -Lisa

data.text: Very convenient and protects both parties. Love using it! UPDATE: After using PayPal more this past year, they have lost a few stars. I have routinely gotten a message when trying to use PayPal for a purchase that I must reset my password due to 'unusual activity' on my account. This is EXTREMELY inconvenient. UPDATE: Password reset issue resolved. Been using the app regularly again without issue! Very convenient again!

I HATE THIS APP!! Was how I started my last review rating for this app. I must admit there have been improvements, but that does not apply to the service for customers. It takes a bit of research to get a live person on the phone. Even when redirected to A.i, it never seems to be able to assist not direct you to the proper resolution for your problem. 4 days of long holds and misdirected directions were a hindrance that most people would not complete but I did! Too much red tape.

I have a recipient with three separate selectable icons in the send list because there's no way to edit when someone changes their email. Also there's no way to delete the extra accounts with non-working email. Also there's no way to tell which recipient icon is linked to which email because the email is not shown when you select a recipiant. After 2 years of use, the send list is so crowded with erroneous names that I don't know for sure where I'm sending money to anymore, most are useless
data.replyText: Contacts can be remove by accessing the account from a web browser. Click "Send and Receive", then click "Manage Contacts". Click the desired contact, then click remove. -Lisa

data.text: The app has become unusable. I have 2 devices and had to play major hell just to attempt to pay off your credit card. I guess when your call center opens (if it still exists) I'll have to scream at someone for a couple hours to pay off the last penny you absolutley wouldn't let me pay off through the app. I got a new phone for a reason, I can't use the old one forever; I guess you don't want my business anymore.

Used pay in 4 to build my computer, never missed a payment or bill in my entire life. Not with paypal, or anyone. Im preapproved for $1500, but the option is no longer available to me. My friend has the options and I dont so its specific to my account. The one time it would be the most useful its not available for me. I use paypal for everything even when my card is sometimes easier because I've always liked paypal. Switching all paypemts out of paypal if this is what happens to loyal users. ðŸ‘Ž

Had a recent issue and had a very unhelpful interaction with customer service chat where they were more interested in 'ACK-shually'ing me than helping. I figured it put after the fact. This is the norm. So, bottom line is it's great and all if you don't have any problems. If you do, be prepared to have PayPal support tell you there's no way to fix it, and then end up fixing it yourself.

It's way too easy to send the wrong person money. Why it doesn't default to my contacts when I type in someone's name and instead picks a completely random person with a similar or same name is absolutely beyond me. I guess the good news is it's not a mistake someone is liable to repeat more then 1-2 times. Of course that in itself is more then enough, but reporting the transaction accomplishes nothing. Fingers crossed the recipient is as honest as the intended recipient. ðŸ˜µ

I have used Paypal for years .. both personally and in my small business .. I like their invoice system.. it's easy to use and maintain .. because I do a great deal of custom work, requiring deposits, I can invoice my customers properly to allow deposit payments .. then balances are paid where they are needed. Paypal is a reliable service, I do not purchase from merchants when they do not take Paypal and want my financial information instead .. no thanks.

VERY difficult to find the resolution center in the app....and that's because you cannot access that feature through the app. Must be done through the web. Once I that got figured out, no more issues! I love using this app, makes it easier to track purchases and settle any disputes that may arise.

PayPal makes all my electronic transfers and transactions simple and easy. It's great for setting aside a personal savings account and it is awesome that it doesn't rob you blind with all the fines, fees, and maintenance costs like so many other Financial institutions and services. The small but secure in-app exclusive Crypto, E-Coins, and Bit Stock trading ability is a great way for someone who is not experienced in the whole Crypto Coin Wallet scene. It would be to be able to transfer out.

EVERY time I tried to add $ to my PayPal account I am unable to and have to call customer service for them to change something on their end. THEN, I had someone else add $ and send it to my PayPal only to not be able to transfer it to my bank when I've used my debit card on this app previously! For an app that's primary use is TRANSFERRING FUNDS how exactly is this possible?! The only good thing about it is that Wawa atms are free but that doesn't help if you can't put $ on your card!

Have had for a couple years. Never had issues until now. I accidentally sent money to an account with the same name as the person I was trying to send it to. I immediately tried to cancel it and my account was locked out. I can not log back in without putting in a code from the linked phone number...it just so happens I no longer have that phone number or one at all. I have money in my account and can't even use it...I would really appreciate it being unlocked afterall the money is MINE.

I keep getting ads by email offering me $3 for spending more than $200. Leave me alone, plz! Old: Can't take a screenshot of my activity (or literally anything in the app). Super annoying to have to use the browser for a simple screenshot. Also, when you receive money that requires a fee, the fee is not made clear in the notifications. You have to manually check to see how much you actually received. I consider that incredibly deceptive.

I do love this app, has made sending and receiving money so much easier. 1 thing I do find a little odd and maybe can be looked into, I setup to use my finger print, everytime I transfer money from my PayPal to my bank I have to use my finger print, which is great but I find it odd that it doesn't do the same when I send money. God forbid someone got into my phone, they could easily send themselves money no problem, just couldn't put any in my account.

I love pay pal , with each update it gets just that much more convenient and user friendly. I do think a few things could be added or moved however just to make them easier to find. But that's is more personal opinion than anything. Bottom line. Pay pal is absolutely the best mobile banking app and offers so many more features then almost any other mobile banking app and it does it all in a somewhat simplified format. I would recommend to anyone who doesn't have it already.

Can't really manage much. Layout is pretty messy. Too many steps just to change a address on a credit card. Annoying ad notifications that need to be turned off. Too many ad forcing ad by default. Should not be having to disable notification or chnage setting for these simole setting. Adware software is what you are making. Keeps using wrong account. Horrible implementation in eBay!!!!
data.replyText: Hi- Thank you for your review. We're sorry to hear about your recent experience, but we'd love to see if there's something we can do to turn your situation around. If you need help with your credit card or to change the billing address, please contact PayPal Support at https://bit.ly/ContactPayPal. Thank you. -Rebeka

data.text: Forced to use PayPal to prepurchase tickets for a convention. Now, PayPal will not allow me to close the account. Don't need it, don't want it, don't trust it, shouldnt be forced to have an account with it tied to my personal accounts. Update, the app has the option to 'close account' , but it does not work. Had to go the the website to finally cancel. Could still never recommend this app for anyone.
data.replyText: For help with closing the account, reach out to customer service by tapping Help in Profile or clicking Contact at the bottom of a PayPal web page. -Lisa

data.text: Continues to get worse. Forces browser log-in when changing between accounts, while constantly trying to auto-fill info. Pushing options regularly that there is no interest in. The old app was much better; now it's more of a hassle than it is worth. How many consecutive security challenges can you require in a row for a simple log in?? And if you type your password in, you'll do another half dozen or more once again. A huge waste of time, especially if you have multiple PayPal accounts.
data.replyText: We're sorry you're having trouble with the app. Try uninstalling, restarting the device, reinstalling, updating the app, then clearing cache. If you need further assistance, contact customer service at https://bit.ly/ContactPayPal. -Lisa

data.text: I keep on having auto login turn on spontaneously when I have two factor authentication turned on, do not share my password or phone with anyone, and log out after every session. And yes, my phone is updated, a newer model, and the app is also updated, as is the Chrome browser I am using. Not sure why this keeps on happening. Update: I am consistently in contact with customer support. Issues keep on happening.
data.replyText: Please contact our customer service at https://bit.ly/ContactPayPal.

data.text: PayPal JP service, in general has been nothing but a dumpster fire for me. It took forever to get the information the verify my account. I tried linking my primary bank account to my PayPal, only to be met with errors. I linked my second bank account, transfer went through, only to be told, almost a week later it fell through. Got told to wait 3-6 business days to try to transfer again, its not like I needed that money for last month's rent or anything...got sent to pages that don't exist, yay!

No point in having an account anymore since they stopped doing the automatic top up. It's very inconvenient to have to manually add money for future payments that will take days to get added onto the balance when I can't determine how much I'll be spending until I get to that point. I didn't even know they got rid of that feature until I needed to make a purchase IRL and my card declined. They sent an announcement thru email that got buried in my inbox. Imagine if I needed that in an emergency.

Automatic payments are very difficult & frustrating to cancel. You are required to login, select the account settings -> payments -> select the "manage automatic payments", now requires the additional steps to click the "see more" button. Which does not show you the full list. You have to continuously click the "see more" button. Going to the actual website is not any better. Same steps. Also errored out using Firefox.

So many little ui bugs make it frustrating to use. Instead of replacing the 0.00 when you enter the amount, it just inserts the number wherever your cursor happened to be. When "reviewing" a payment about to send, and you change apps, the amount gets sent anyways so I can't actually review it. Messages/comments can't be copied from old payments.

App has become way too buggy. Literally everytime I try to pay for something I get stuck in a load screen. I have to try random things to get past it and it's annoying and time consuming as it sometimes takes 20+ minutes to finalize a purchase. I recently attempted to purchase movie tickets and an "authorization in progress" alert from the Darden Corp was pending so long that I couldn't get the tickets in time. Why bother having a wallet if money cannot easily be transferred, it's self defeating

I'm switching slowly all my regular banking to PayPal. It's easy to use, always open, does everything a regular bank does only faster. I get my check 3 days earlier than I used to and it counts when you only get paid once a month. Would be 5 stars if the dispute area were easier and not as finite a person should be able to redispute especially if charges are still trying to come through from the same place on a closed card that was closed due to this issue. Otherwise I'm loving it!
data.replyText: Thanks for sharing! We're glad you're enjoying the app and hope you continue to do so. -Lisa

data.text: Horrible service. Started it out good, But then had some issues loading money on my PayPal account with my debit card. Talk to customer service for 2 months straight. And only answer they can give me is that it's a system issue. And that there's nothing they can do. So for two months I was not able to add money to my PayPal account and they don't even know when issues going to be resolved. To be honest I didn't use this app that much besides a gambling app that I use but overall it's sucks

App works fine with the exception of the request money function which consistently errors out. I contacted customer support and they agreed my account is verified and should be able to make requests, "so there must be a system issue". My other contacts are able to make requests so a system issue seems unlikely. At the end of the call they recommended I "just use another app". I will gladly re-rate if someone can help me with this issue instead of just giving up.

I recently went to Canada and decided to use my PayPal credit for Lyft. Despite checking the boxes not to charge my balance, and choosing the "check out with PayPal credit" option, they still charged my account. Upon checking with them I was informed it doesn't matter what I choose, PayPal will always charge balance first, despite there being clear options that say otherwise. Never using the service again. They altered my billing agreement, misled me, then told me to kick rocks when I noticed.

Was working fine until the other day. Now just shuts off as it's loading. I received an error notice stating that the app has a bug and I need to wait for the developers to fix it and then reinstall updated app. I have to go to the web-based version to get in right now. Just to be sure I did uninstall/reinstall and cleared cache. It didn't work.
data.replyText: Hi â€“ Weâ€™re sorry to hear that you've had a negative experience with the app. That is definitely not what we want for our customers. By giving us your feedback, you are helping us understand common pain points. Should you need account specific help, please reach Customer Support by clicking 'Contact' at the bottom of our website. Thanks!

data.text: Very shady company. Trouble with almost anything I do on the app whether its connecting to my bank account (still hasn't worked) or simply using money in my account to pay for an item. Tried already to make a clause allowing them to fine customers when they seemed fit. When I did call to ask about a payment issue, I played with an automated vm for 10 minutes before finally transferring me to a human, where I then had to wait and finally gave up on waiting. Taking my business to cashapp for sure.

Used to allow multiple accounts and remember them in the app, just signing in by selecting the account and scanning fingerprint. Now it makes me manually type in the full email and password when switching accounts, and doesn't save the username or password. Worse still, it makes me do the annoying Captcha picture selection each time. Very frustrating and time consuming.

I manage to log in, and then I click on Payin3, and the app closes immediately. This has been going on for about 2 months. I have now uninstalled. Tried everything. Nothing works. The answer I received said uninstall etc, do they really think I haven't tried this! Tried going through the help centre, cannot figure out which area to go to. None of them seem to apply to my issue. I give up.
data.replyText: Thank you for writing back to us. Please login to your account and select "Contact us" and choose any issue to get in touch with our support team. Once you get in touch in with our support team then you can explain the issue so they can assist you further.

data.text: If you want to use two physical security keys (one primary and one backup) it is not possible. Instead they force you to use one security key and one authenticator OTP. Great. Super smart @PayPal. So people getting two security keys, only supporting FIDO will not be able to use their keys, unless they forcefully choose to use one of the public authenticator apps available. Ever since the user-experience configuring one's account on PayPal is shattered into pieces such design decisions.

What is up with this app now, past 2 updates I haven't been able to type in the amounts correctly, keyboard and the entry field are completely bugging out & doesn't recognize dot but randomly throws it in making amounts wrong, also would not allow me to type more than 4 digits in Yen. I had to log in on a browser to be able to type the corrent amount for payment. Useless. Paypal works but their app does not.
data.replyText: Hi there, Good Day and thanks for your message. We are sorry to know you face inconvenience trying to use application. I understand this is frustrating. Please uninstall & reinstall the application. Update application very often for software updates. You can refer PayPal.com/help or click on "Contact Us" at the bottom of the web page. ~ Bharath

data.text: Recently added a bank account via the app for one-off transfers rather than using my credit card which carries additional fees. Prior to that, all my recurring payments had been made from my credit card. Without warning or my explicit consent, the app changed the recurring payments to come from the bank account and put that account into overdrawn status. Update: Contacted customer support who did not even attemp to try to understand the problem which is an alert to the change of payment source.
data.replyText: Hi there, we are sorry to know you were charged wrong funding source for recurring payment. Please contact our customer care team for further support with this issue. You can do this by clicking on 'Help and Contact' at the bottom of the any page on the PayPal website www.paypal.com. Thank you! ~Priyanka

data.text: When changing the billing address for Pay in 3 you chop and delete my address. Test this address: Flat 123 Butterfly House, 12 Butterfly Street, Cambridge, BT1 1FL Fails every time. Also please remove all animations that shift the ui when an element loads in late. It's pretty dangerous. You'll find an example of this it everytime you enter and exit an option in the Profile settings page. Loads, nothing happens then random shifts elements. Tell you UI crew "No fancy animations! No shifting!"
data.replyText: Hi there, we recognize how challenging this has been as you were unable to update the billing address and you are facing an issue with the user interface. Please connect through call or chat by using Help/Contact button at bottom left of the PayPal website (https://www.paypal.com), our team will guide you further on your concern. AJ

data.text: The app has become dangerous because it no longer automatically adds a decimal point. For example, previously typing 1000 would send Â£10.00, but now it sends Â£1000.00. I don't think I'm alone in believing that it's better to under pay rather than over pay. Update: The clowns at PayPal suggest I reinstall the app, but the issue is with app... A friend has just paid me Â£1,133 by mistake, instead of Â£11.33. Luckily were in a position to fix the issue without consequence, but it needs to be fixed.
data.replyText: We're sorry you're having trouble with the app. Try uninstalling, restarting the device, reinstalling, then clearing cache. If you need further assistance, contact customer service at https://bit.ly/ContactPayPal. -Lisa

data.text: The PayPal Android app offers a reliable platform for transactions, and its user interface is generally intuitive. I appreciate the convenience it brings to online payments and transfers. However, occasional glitches and slower loading times can be frustrating. With some improvements, it could easily be a five-star app. Worth using, but room for enhancement.

I recently used the PayPal app, and overall, it provided a seamless experience. The user interface is intuitive, making navigation easy. The app's features are robust, and I appreciated its smooth performance. However, occasionally glitches were noticeable. Customer report waa responsive addressing my concern issues, the app enhances productivity effectively.

PayPal has been a lifesaver for me! This app stood by me during tough times when my bank account was in the negative due to stolen money. It became my go-to for all transactions, ensuring I could still pay for everything seamlessly. The feature allowing installment payments with zero interest is fantastic. Plus, the ability to transfer money with minimal to novfees adds to the app's overall greatness. PayPal, you've been my reliable financial companion, and I can't recommend you enough :)

After the last 2 updates, it seems like PayPal has finally got rid of the ancient sms verification method. Now transfering your money from PP to the bank account is automatic and there isn't the need to get any Sms (finally). I don't know if this is definitive or it's because some accounts have enough security level to allow that (fingerprint and 2FA). However it seems that is impossible to choose the amount to transfer. But it might have been me who simply overlooked the possibility to choose.

It works well, but it feels like the moment there's a problem with it, it cascades and gets worse. Says my account needs info redone, but then tells me to put in my password, then it doesn't work (even though it's the correct password), then tries to get me to reset it, then sends my phone a verification which I do not recieve, then back to square one.

PayPal app is strange. My account is in EUR, but this app was forcing me to use USD. That means, I should always buy USD from my bank, send USD to PayPal, then exchange at PayPal again to EUR, until the money is free to leave, and pay two times for the exchange rate. And BTW, PayPal exchange rate is horrible, it's ripping off! So I deleted the app, it's rubbish.
data.replyText: Hi! Thanks for contacting PayPal. We are sorry for the currency and conversion rate. To learn more, refer to the link: https://www.paypal.com/cshelp/article/help108. Here's the link about PayPal exchange rate: https://www.paypal.com/cshelp/article/help109. For more assistance, please visit https://www.paypal.com/Help Center. Thank you! Rebecca.

data.text: Like many other users, the app now crashes out after loading into the front page. Have done all the usual fixes - clearing cache, app data. Removed and reinstalled app. Reset phone. To no avail. The mobile web experience is much more clunky. Have used app for many years with no problems until beginning of the month. Very disappointing. edit-contacted customer service as per below, and er...well....no progress, nothing further. App still now useless. Have tried on diff devices, all broken.
data.replyText: We're sorry to hear about your recent experience, but we'd love to see if there's something we can do to turn your situation around. Please contact customer service at https://bit.ly/ContactPayPal. -Lisa

data.text: Basic things work but cannot send money using the app, especially four digit number, probably in German speaking countries. For example, if you want to send â‚¬1000, in step one it automatically adds comma to the amount -> â‚¬1,000 then in the consecutive step it coverts amount to â‚¬10.00 - so far there is no comma in first step, amount stays unchanged. PLEASE FIX IT.

The app constantly crashes, cannot use it at all on S24 Ultra, latest update. As soon as you log in, it crashes, the system also now placed it into a deep sleep because its constantly crashing. I also emailed support and had no replies back, I can only log in via browser. The 1 star is based on my experience with it, which is - cannot do anything with the app, so had to be removed as no support is provided either.

As with other users of the app (on phone) it now crashes on the opening page. I called PayPal, like other people have, and followed their suggestion to empty the cache, restart phone, uninstall/reinstall app etc, but no help at all. Personally I don't want to go on their website every time, the app has been working fine for years! PayPal, please attend to this issue.

Pasting an email in the app is awkward. It doesn't work when I long press the field and is only sometimes available on the keyboard. When entering a payment amount the keyboard is very awkward. The default view has a point but no comma but I need to use the comma to enter an amount with cents so I need to go to another view of the keyboard. Using the point does not work and causes the amount to be 100 times too large.

Have made several payments to my pay pal credit account and after several days it still isn't showing up on my available credit. My balance is going down but available credit to spend is not changing. Have paid $295 since last week and nothing has shown up in my available credit. If this doesn't change I'll not make another payment and just take a judgment against me. Because I'm not going to continue to make payments and not have the ability to use the credit account.
data.replyText: Hi there, thank you for your post. I understand how frustrating and inconvenience it is when unable to use card. please refer link https://www.paypal.com/us/cshelp/article/HELP404. it's best to contact us by clicking help/contact at PayPal pages (https://www.paypal.com) for further assistance.

data.text: PayPal used to be a great trustworthy application. They are responsible for sites like Ebay being successful. That is until recently. I made an online purchase, and I used PayPal for their customer protection policy. Unfortunately not only did the website not ship the item they denied ever receiving the order, despite multiple emails from PayPal containing an order number, I also found reoccurring payments were set up. PayPal refused to help, or cover the loss. Guess I'll use X & venmo
data.replyText: We are sorry to know you have not received your order and I know how concerning this could be. I recommend you to please go ahead and raise a dispute with the seller, by following the steps: https://www.paypal.com/cshelp/article/help160 or reach us through https://www.paypal.com/smarthelp/contact-us for more information. Thank you! ^Mujahid

data.text: When using the app to request money from friends for things they owe, it's very easy for them to miss a setting which says I'm not selling them something so I keep getting charged a seller's fee and so far I haven't been able to claim it back. Otherwise, I like that I can see the balance and transactions easily and find people who I need to pay / who I need to request money from.

Usually everything is fine. But I can't transfer my money anymore because of the buggy keyboard layout. When I want to send money to my account it always interpret as example 7.80 to 7,8000.80. And so on. I live in Germany and set the system language to english. I don't thing it matters, because before that changes it already was functional and all of my friends have similar problems. Edit: Still can't send MY money to me. Bad for a app that sense is to send money.

App is buggy & clunky! Constantly locks up/freezes to the point that it needs to be uninstalled and reinstalled. This isn't a new issue so much as just another iteration in a long line of faults within the PayPal interfaces. PayPal concept is great, but this app and the tech support behind it sucks!

Still clunky and non-intuitive. Need to simplify it for people who don't want to use crypto or send money, and just need it to pay online, which is how it was originally intended. I had to set up a mandate for my bank account and it repeatedly refused to update...until I went into my balance and changed the settings there. Every time I pay online it prompts me to update my address to match the one against my back account...only I've already done that and it's still not happy
data.replyText: Hi Nick. Sorry to hear this. Please contact our Customer Care team for further help with this issue. You can do this by clicking 'Help and Contact' at the bottom of any PayPal Webpage. Rebecca

data.text: I do not recommend PAYPAL. You guys are the worst ever! This app is just good enough to send to peer to peer. You can't even send from PayPal to your capitec debit card. I have done everything and followed all instructions and some of it isn't on the app to link your card. Example go to wallet so call click on a the plus sign but yet there are no plus sign to tap on. I have been trying to send my money to my bank account. I am now fed up. I do use other apps and without an issue or problematic.

Recently the application automatically closes down once opened. Customer support are of no use. Constantly being told check your software is up to date check the application is up to date. You can clearly tell no one actually read the feedback as you just told me all the same responses. The amount of people having the same issue this is related to the app not the individual
data.replyText: Regrettably, this platform is not a means of help with account specific issues. By giving us your feedback, you are helping us understand common pain points. We appreciate your insight. If the app continues to give you trouble, please use our full website. Thank you!

data.text: Account hacked. I've been an PayPal user ever since. Thinking it is the safest and original platform of cash app.Expanding thru different platforms makes it better. But last night, I found out that my account was hacked, email and number completely erased/replaced from account. I have 2 factor authentication even passkey face recognition/fingerprint.After it was stolen I saw this email from PayPal that changes occur. Without verifying you replaced it?on bright side Support was great to recover.
data.replyText: Hi there, thanks for contacting PayPal. I'm sorry to hear that your account is hacked. I'd recommend you to Please contact our phone support team or chat team by visiting 'contact us' page on our website or visit help center/paypal.com for more information.

data.text: I MADE 2 FRAUD Transaction REPORTS LAST NIGHT. PayPal MESSAGE CENTRE has a record of both. However, each time I click on one of these records to see progress on work, I get this: "Something Went Wrong ... Please try again." At one point, it even left the App to load an HTML page where Chrome asked that I log back in. WHAT IS THIS MESS PAYPAL?????
data.replyText: Hello Ash G. We're sorry to hear about the fraud transactions and the negative experience that you had to face with the website. If you're unable to locate the dispute information, please check here: https://www.paypal.com/cshelp/article/help160. For more help, please contact us using the following : https://www.paypal.com/smarthelp/contact-us.

data.text: Every update makes this app more useless. It's being rewritten to make it easier every day. Which means features disappeare. The last update has wound me up. I leave money in my PayPal for automatic payments. The new withdrawal system by default fills in with draw with your entire balance. Twice I have accidently clicked withdraw and had to transfer what I wanted left back. Get rid of the auto filled forms PayPal nobody asked you for them did they? PayPal 6 years ago was perfect.

Great when it works... terrible when trying to dispute charges. Have had a case open for almost 3 weeks where initial person took case and didn't enter my info provided. Have had to call and check up multiple times with no progress in case. Nothing but headaches and customer service's useless automated service does nothing for me. Getting ready to find another payment processing app because service has been far from efficient.

I actually never used the application despite I kept it in my app list. But I wanted to use it for a fund transfer purpose and, I tried to add my debit card but it was a fail due to low balance for verification. Now my card got hacked, it's a new card , I'm getting many purchase requests with huge amount. Thankfully I didn't kept any balance in that account since it's for my private use. Deleting this application for privacy concerns.
data.replyText: Hi there! Thank you for contacting PayPal. We regret hearing about your experience with our service. Please reach out to your card issuer to report the hack. Here's the link to learn on how to add the card: https://www.paypal.com/cshelp/article/help155. For further assistance, please visit https://www.paypal.com/Help Center. Thank you! Rebecca.

data.text: Previous review from last two years running, now applies again... Was working fine until latest update. Now the app keeps crashing. Have tried uninstalling, then reinstalling... but still keeps crashing. The same has happened after the last few updates. This includes following the advice to uninstall, restart, reinstall and clearing cache...
data.replyText: We're sorry you're having trouble with the app. Try updating the app after uninstalling, restarting the device, reinstalling, then clearing cache. If you need further assistance, contact customer service at https://bit.ly/ContactPayPal. -Lisa

data.text: Paypal randomly held up 3 of my payments for a compliance review after using their services for 10 years with no issues. There is no way to contact their live customer support, which is unavailable during their own mentioned US business hours and the only option is some kind of call back system. The New Message button they keep mentioning in their contact FAQ doesn't exist in the browser OR the app. Terrible lack of customer service!

A terrible app, very often freezes or shows error messages. Also they can't work out 6+1 in the transaction history or worse some of that dissappears magically. Customer service does not work at all. Very often you would get a notification that all agents are 'off line' during 9-5 office hours. They acknowledge there is an issue and immediately close case afterwards. Avoid! Avoid!
data.replyText: Hi- We're sorry you're having trouble with the app. Try uninstalling and reinstalling it. If you need further assistance, please contact our customer service at https://bit.ly/ContactPayPal. -Lisa

data.text: Started making problems after last few recent updates, especially typing in numbers and setting a comma doesn't work properly or not at all anymore. It's giving me the phone dial keyboard instead of a normal number keyboard which makes it impossible to type in uneven numbers. The app keeps suggesting me to transfer 1-2 thousand of euros instead just a few 10-20 euros. Reinstalling the app seems to fix it, but after the next app start the bug happens again. Not gonna reinstall Paypal everytime.
data.replyText: Hi â€“ Weâ€™re sorry to hear that you've had a negative experience with the app. That is definitely not what we want for our customers. By giving us your feedback, you are helping us understand common pain points. Should you need account specific help, please reach Customer Support by clicking 'Contact' at the bottom of our website. Thanks!

data.text: Please, is there a way I could give this APP a ZERO STAR....? because I'm confused about what has become of paypal. The app is frustrating, or should I say the Platform. One can't link an account or debit/credit card and its been this way for days if not weeks. I keep on try, hoping it might work at some point. But seriously it doesn't get better. I have had to uninstall and re install the app and still getting the same result. Please help.

I used the app on android mobile. The app is difficult to navogate, not user friendly. Many options are unresponsive so much so that for linking and confirming my bank account, I needed the help of their customer support. The app also randomly logs out in mid session and repeatedly asks to log in. May be their computer or laptop versions are more effective, but then why build an app?

PayPal has helped so much in offering monthly payments without interest applies. But the majority downfall not related to the App is how they consolidate 4 months payments, into 12 month payments and vice versa. Cannot pay individual purchases off. Then incure charges for late payments. Biggest downfall

Constant closing after app load on Pixel 7 has continued for almost two months, now. Others have complained and nothing has been done- I've tried force-stopping, clearing the cache, and clearing the data, uninstalling and reinstalling, then looking for an update after the reinstallation... Nothing works. Also, the PayPal exchange rates are insanely inflated. You should be ashamed for both the hyper-inflated exchange rates and constant app failures. So disappointed after years of using you.
data.replyText: We're sorry to hear about your recent experience, but we'd love to see if there's something we can do to turn your situation around. Please contact customer service at https://bit.ly/ContactPayPal. -Lisa

data.text: Good way to tras matrix digits, with whoever excepts it? I think cash can be too dirty for my skin, some paper cash that's been through cities is laced with posions sum call "drugs".? Cash can be disgusting. Mine, lately, is all fresh minted... This app can still be easier in many situations though! I use a few accounts and I think the app correspondes... With the different Google profiles in the creepy sense like... The advertisement on the app figures what you wanna order from how you Google

Cannot take screenshots due to ridiculous boomer idea of increasing "security". I need to get on my computer to do this basic thing which I require monthly for bookkeeping. It's completely useless. Plus you cannot print statements of transactions, which I'd use instead of trying to screenshot.

Kind of sucks. I wanted to send via Friends and Family but it wouldn't let change from Goods and Services. Here's an update - they really suck. I sold some auto manuals through PayPal and used their shipping and labeling services. The transaction went smoothly. I supposedly received $266 for the sale and the buyer received the merchandise over 2 weeks ago. However, PayPal has not released the money to me for no apparent reason. I followed their rules,and they are holding my money hostage
data.replyText: We're sorry to know that the funds are still not released. We apologize for the inconvenience caused to you in this regard. To assist you further, please visit www.paypal.com and navigate to the bottom of the page, then click on "Contact Us." From there, you'll find options for secure chat or direct calling, depending on your country.

data.text: No face unlock. Unilaterally reverses received payments without any notice. Overdrafts your account and steals money from received payments until your artificial/fake debt is paid. Blocks payment methods and doesn't let you re-link them to other accounts. Enables Chinese sellers to sell products in Europe that don't work in Europe. Requests more evidence after you provide evidence of this. Deletes form whenever you switch apps, forcing you to always start from scratch. Doesn't open PayPal links.
data.replyText: Hi Filipe. Sorry to hear this. If there is anything we can help with, please contact our Customer Care team for further help with this issue. You can do this by clicking 'Help and Contact' at the bottom of any PayPal Webpage. Rebecca

data.text: Fast and easy payments with PayPal! I love the app way better than the PayPal website. It's much easier and convenient. You can send and receive $ from ANYONE! (All over the world as far as I know.)Note* I've been using PayPal every since I was 17 years young. I'm now 31 years young, and PayPal is still here and running fast and smooth as it did 14+ years ago! Now that's good business. Also, my younger sister uses PayPal for payments for her art work, etc. She love PayPa! l5 star review!ðŸ”¥ðŸ’œ

The app will automatically freeze your funds in the middle of transactions for reasons that no one can seem to articulate or do anything about when contacted. It is impossible to know when or why a transaction will be frozen. This occurs wether the transaction is routine or unique. If you're doing any sort of transaction that requires timely payment you should look elsewhere. If time is not a factor then this is a good app for you.

I would rate higher, however the most recent update has made it unnecessarily difficult to access PayPal Credit. It used to be in the main screen, now you have to search through tabs to find it. Please fix. PayPal Credit access should be an option upon opening the app.
data.replyText: Thank you for taking the time to share your thoughts with us. Your feedback is incredibly valuable as we strive to improve our products and services. Chethan

data.text: I've been using psy pal for years, yet now my pay in 3 option on all my usual sites have been removed, I contacted PayPal yet they said there's no issue just depends on merchants !! Well ive used it on ebay many times to name one yet 5 others are doing the same, and I've been on time with all my payments. Not usefully app or website for contacting on, maybe other pay in 3 apps are more useful now. Needs fixing ASAP I've tried all the contact ways still nothing
data.replyText: Hi there! Thanks for contacting us. We are sorry to hear that you are having trouble with pay in 3 installments. You can refer to this article to find more information on pay in 3- https://www.paypal.com/webapps/mpp/paypal-payin3/faq. For account specific support, please visit https://www.paypal.com/smarthelp/contact-us^ Shantha

data.text: Really poorly designed and executed. Never try to pay in 4, the payment will fail even if your account is fine, then the page they email you to make the payment will lead to a 404. This page to make a payment is also impossible to find, even though it should really pop up as soon as you open the app.
data.replyText: Hello James! Thank you for your review! I'm sorry to know that you're facing issues with Pay in 4 payments. In this situation, it's best to contact our customer support to resolve this issue. You can find available options for contacting our Customer Support here: https://www.paypal.com/smarthelp/contact-us. Thanks. Have a good day!

data.text: This used to be a great app and convenient way to pay not anymore. I recieved an email saying I missed an automated payment. check the app shows I had made the automated payment and that pay pal had then tried to take it again which failed. called the support number listed, the electronic assistant could verify me, but the human assistant could not based on me reading my account details from my app. they were unable to transfer me to anyone who could assist as I could not verify who I am

I received 2 different transfers for over $2K on March 4 and immediately successfully transferred them from my Paypal account to my Schwab Bank account. However, on March 8, Paypal reversed the transaction, effectively taking over $2K from my account. One cannot "speak" with a rep, one can only "chat" using their tiny little chat app that does not permit attachments, which they asked for. They now claim to not know where my money is. Shameful!!!!! Zelle works flawlessly, so will move to Zelle.
data.replyText: Hi there! Thank you for contacting PayPal. We apologize for the inconvenience caused. Please contact us over a phone or chat so our team can review the case for further assistance. You can visit https://www.paypal.com/smarthelp/contact-us to contact our team.

data.text: Absolutely terrible app with legitimately NO CUSTOMER SERVICE. I had an account for years that I never used because they rejected it for some reason, now I'm permanently banned from PayPal, but they won't let me transfer the money that's been on hold for years and I can't even shut down the account. Instead, it's just there telling me I no longer have access to services without telling me why. PayPal is a horrendous company and I'm glad it's going the way of the dinosaur.

The app only gives an option to add an American bank account. What about the 180+ other international countries whose users do not have US bank accounts? Your app is built short-sighted. I had to use my online account because your app keeps on telling me, Sorry, there is an issue... bla bla bla. Sort it out, please. Your competitors are becoming more and more attractive to use...

There's a bug! Everytime I put in my password, the app tells me it's incorrect. Pretty much forcing me to have to use the desktop site, where it is accepted. Please fix! Update: I had to reinstall, and it's works now. Thanks for the reply!
data.replyText: For future assistance, please access our help center articles here: www.PayPal.com/help or reach us through https://www.paypal.com/smarthelp/contact-us for more personalized account specific information. We hope you get the necessary help, and all your questions are answered. Thank you.

data.text: Gets the job done as an alternative way to make purchases or transfer funds quickly. Seems safer than other apps/platforms. The fee for adding cash in store is too high though and I don't know how you really earn rewlards without shopping.
data.replyText: NE- General feedback

data.text: The app is alright, but it needs a lot of accessibility overhauls... Only reason I'm able to use it without having to turn on TalkBack, is because I've had to memorize the buttons I need to use, which means I hardly use. But what I use it for, it works...

I used to have trouble with PayPal. trying to change my email with them was impossible. but. I've since just dealt with it, and now they have cute emojis to send... and the money changes hands..so. I think I'm fine. anyway. if I could change out of my old email, to present email...I'd give 5 stars.

Do not do crypto over PayPal. The fee plus the spread is outrageous and whether or not you're able to actually transfer your crypto to other wallets is spotty. I've been getting an error message, and they can't help me at all. Their recommendation is selling it and transferring the money. If I do that they'll get another $70 out of me. I feel like my money is being held for ransom.
data.replyText: Hi there, thank you for consulting PayPal. I'm sorry that you're not able to make a crypto transfer. I recommend you to please go through these link: https://bitly.ws/3frzT and https://bitly.ws/3frA9 which provides an answer to your question. If there are any further questions please visit our help center article page at paypal.com. Thanks!
